code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'./slices/authSlice';import quizReducer from'./slices/quizSlice';import uiReducer from'./slices/uiSlice';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,quiz:quizReducer,ui:uiReducer},middleware:getDefaultMiddleware=>getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:['persist/PERSIST']}})});export default store;
